page.title: 09LOCAL SERVICES
page.content: {P.C Lowe Mr Lowe has been a police man for 22 years. The{uniform and the car is {provided,}but not the shoes and socks. You have to be 18 and a half years old to join.You have to be 5 foot 9 with a 38 inch chest. He mainly deals with {people's problems.}He works 8 hours a day. {Mr Stainburn (Postman) Mr Stainburn has been a postman for 18 years.He delivers about {600 letters}in Monk Fryston only.He rides a bike and starts his round at 6 a.m.,finishing at about 12 noon.Uniform and bike are provided.He likes the job because it's local. {P.C. Megson He has been policing South Milford for{16 years},covering Lumby. He has never been injured and is sometimes called out at night.
